item.title: Tools
item.description: Geophysics IRIS Message Center IRIS Seismic Monitor IRIS Station Monitor 3-D earthquake display IASPEI standard phase list Free oscillations of the Earth Chemistry Periodic Table Interactive periodic table of the elements Document Processing Squoosh: Image compression web app provided by Googl PDF2JPG: Free PDF to JPG converter Smallpdf: Solve any problems with PDF (conversion, compression, rotate, merge, unlock) ILovePDF: Every tool you need to work with PDFs ILoveIMG: Every tool
